articles.description: The company is aiming to install rooftop solar systems in 10 million households, Chairman and Managing Director Vivek Kumar Dewangan announced on Tuesday adding that in this major push towards renewable energy, REC will lend up to Rs 1.2 lakh crore for the in…
articles.content: REC shares shot up nearly 7% to the day's high of Rs 464.80 on the NSE after the state-run power company was designated as the nodal agency for the Pradhan Mantri Suryodaya Yojana.The company is aimi… [+2364 chars]
